email_text:
Subject: Your Spotify Premium Renewal Confirmation

Dear [Customer's Name],

We are pleased to inform you that your Spotify Premium subscription has been successfully renewed for another month. Your continued support allows us to provide you with an ad-free listening experience and access to exclusive content.

Billing Details:
- Subscription Plan: Spotify Premium
- Renewal Date: [Renewal Date]
- Billing Amount: $9.99
- Payment Method: [Payment Method]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your subscription, please feel free to contact our customer support team at support@spotify.com. 

Thank you for being a valued member of the Spotify community.

Sincerely,
The Spotify Team
